title: Domains
description: Manage your domain names, DNS and redirections
selectDomain: Select a domain from the list

dns.title: DNS servers
dns.description: List of DNS servers configured for this domain

zone.title: DNS zone
zone.description: Manage DNS records for your domain

redirection.title: Redirections
redirection.description: Web redirections configured for this domain

dnssec.title: DNSSEC
dnssec.description: DNS security to protect your domain against attacks
dnssec.enabledDesc: Your domain is protected by DNSSEC
dnssec.disabledDesc: Enable DNSSEC to secure your domain
dnssec.unsupported: DNSSEC is not available for this domain
dnssec.explanation: DNSSEC (Domain Name System Security Extensions) adds a security layer to DNS by cryptographically signing DNS records, protecting against cache poisoning and man-in-the-middle attacks.

glue.title: Glue Records
glue.description: Glue records for hosting your own DNS servers
glue.emptyHint: Glue Records are required if you host your own DNS servers on this domain
glue.explanation: A Glue Record resolves a circular reference problem when you host your own DNS servers under your domain (e.g., ns1.yourdomain.com). It directly associates the DNS server name with its IP address at the registry level.

dynhost.title: DynHost
dynhost.description: Dynamic DNS for variable IP connections
dynhost.emptyHint: DynHost allows pointing a subdomain to a dynamic IP
dynhost.explanation: DynHost allows you to point a subdomain to a dynamic IP address (like from a home internet connection). The IP is automatically updated via an HTTP request from your network.

tasks.title: Ongoing operations
tasks.description: History of operations performed on this domain
